document_data.name: Arguth
document_data.mainbody:
'''Arguth''' was a [[half-elf]] [[wizard]] living on [[Ambral Isle]] in the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].

He was in [[Cormanthor]]'s Courts in [[261 DR]] and offered his help in the creation of the ''[[mythal]]'' of [[Myth Drannor]].{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|4-6}}
